SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Load Mini-Cart Content More Quickly

Improve the user experience on pages where the mini-cart component is enabled. B2B Commerce for Visualforce now loads content in the mini-cart more efficiently.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

How: After you upgrade the managed package, the ccrz.cc_util_UITransformsCart.fetchMiniCart() call now uses the following specific sizing declaration:

ccrz.ccApi.SZ_DATA => ccrz.ccApi.SZ_L

In previous versions of B2B Commerce for Visualforce, this sizing declaration wasn't included, and B2B Commerce fell back to ccrz.ccApi.SZ_XL. This data size includes more cart data than the mini-cart component uses.

If you previously created subscriber code that extended ccrz.cc_util_UITransformsCart.fetchMiniCart(), update your code to account for the specific ccrz.ccApi.SZ_L data sizing.
